name: LitPlayer
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lit player
des:
To open the player say: Alexa, open Lit Player

Next station: Alexa next

Previous station: Alexa back

To play particular station: Alexa stop: say the number of the station ( as per message) . For example: Alexa two.

To exit the player: Alexa cancel.

Available Stations: Play Radio, Radiocentras, M-1, Power Hit Radio, Zip FM, Lietus, Relax FM, Easy FM, LRT Radijas, LRT Opus, Žinių Radijas, Start FM, M-1 Plius, Power Hit Radio Gold, TG FM, Laluna, Raduga, Radio-R, Znad Wilii, Rock FM, Beveik Radijas, LRT Klasika 

------

You can automatically listen to Lit Player by adding it to your Daily routine. To add this skill to a daily timer, follow these steps:
On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
Click + to add a new routine.
Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
Choose "Your Skills" > Select LT Stream.
Choose Device to perform the routine > SAVE.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
